import React, { Component } from 'react' class EditComponent extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { campName: "", campEmail:"", campPhone:"", campPassword:"", selectRole:0 } } render() { return (
this.setState({campName:value.target.value})}/>
this.setState({campPhone:value.target.value})}/>
this.setState({campEmail:value.target.value})}/>
this.setState({campPassword:value.target.value})}/>
) } } export default EditComponent;
